name: Only two ways to live your life Printable Einstein Quote Poster - Original Digital Print
description:
The quoted wisdom of Einstein designed with a digital illustration created by me for you. A beautifully designed poster perfect for that spot on the wall you've been eyeing, or a great unique gift for a loved one. Perfect for someone who loves quirky and thought provoking items.

CHOOSE YOUR COLOUR
Yellow, Blue or Red, the choice is yours. Once the order is received you will receive a 10" x 8" (20.3 x 25.4 cm) image and PDF file via email. It can be printed unlimited times, for your personal use only (e.g. can be given for gifts freely but not sold). Please do not forward, sell or share digital file.

THIS IS A DIGITAL FILE - WHY DIGITAL?
-----------------------------------------------------
•	For those who love DIY, you can be creative as you like.
•	Print unlimited copies! Create a family of smaller sized prints!!
•	Professionally print on canvas, special paper, stickers or even wood!
•	Super fast delivery! Free of Shipping Fees!


WHAT YOU GET
-----------------------------------------------------
•	A 10" x 8" (20.3 x 25.4 cm) image and PDF which can be printed at this size or smaller.
•	This listing is for the creation and delivery of a Digital File for you to print yourself (at home or professionally). No physical product will be shipped.

Please Note
-----------------------------------------------------
•	Due to different monitor and printer configurations, output colours may vary.
•	Refunds cannot be provided for digital files due to the nature of the product.

Copyright Notice
-----------------------------------------------------
•	All copyrights © and trademarks™ of the characters used belong to their respective owners and are not being sold. 
•	This item is not a licensed product and I do not claim ownership over the character/s used in this design. 
•	This is designed and created by me (http://mindgarden.me/) using my digital illustrations. This listing is for the time/work used to create and personalise your item. 
•	The artwork is not for commercial purposes; you cannot resell the design, parts of the design or sell prints from it. As such, the digital file, and any designs contained within, may be used for personal use only.
•	Please do not forward, sell or share the digital file.

-----------------------------------------------------
If you love my work, check out my website http://mindgarden.me/. Find out more about my love of design and all things arty.
-----------------------------------------------------
